/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Tall buildings stretch towards the sky, their windows reflecting the sunlight. The street below is a hive of activity with cars and taxis in motion, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Trees and streetlights line the sides of the street, providing a sense of order amidst the city's hustle and bustle.
